068/**
069 * Watches for changes of VM definitions.
070 */
071@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
072public class VmWatcher extends Component {
073
074    private String namespaceToWatch;
075    private final Map<String, VmChannel> channels = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
076
077    /**
078     * Instantiates a new VM definition watcher.
079     *
080     * @param componentChannel the component channel
081     */
082    public VmWatcher(Channel componentChannel) {
083        super(componentChannel);
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Configure the component.
088     *
089     * @param event the event
090     */
091    @Handler
092    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
093        event.structured(Components.manager(parent()).componentPath())
094            .ifPresent(c -> {
095                if (c.containsKey("namespace")) {
096                    namespaceToWatch = (String) c.get("namespace");
097                }
098            });
099    }
100
101    /**
102     * Handle the start event.
103     *
104     * @param event the event
105     * @throws IOException 
106     * @throws ApiException 
107     */
108    @Handler(priority = 10)
109    public void onStart(Start event) {
110        try {
111            startWatching();
112        } catch (IOException | ApiException e) {
113            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
114                () -> "Cannot watch VMs, terminating.");
115            event.cancel(true);
116            fire(new Exit(1));
117        }
118    }
119
120    private void startWatching() throws IOException, ApiException {
121        // Get namespace
122        if (namespaceToWatch == null) {
123            var path = Path
124                .of("/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/namespace");
125            if (Files.isReadable(path)) {
126                namespaceToWatch = Files.lines(path).findFirst().orElse(null);
127            }
128        }
129        // Availability already checked by Controller.onStart
130        logger.fine(() -> "Watching namespace \"" + namespaceToWatch + "\".");
131
132        // Get all our API versions
133        var client = Config.defaultClient();
134        var apis = new ApisApi(client).getAPIVersions();
135        var vmOpApiVersions = apis.getGroups().stream()
136            .filter(g -> g.getName().equals(VM_OP_GROUP)).findFirst()
137            .map(V1APIGroup::getVersions).stream().flatMap(l -> l.stream())
138            .map(V1GroupVersionForDiscovery::getVersion).toList();
139
140        // Remove left overs
141        var coa = new CustomObjectsApi(client);
142        purge(client, coa, vmOpApiVersions);
143
144        // Start a watcher thread for each existing CRD version.
145        // The watcher will send us an "ADDED" for each existing VM.
146        for (var version : vmOpApiVersions) {
147            coa.getAPIResources(VM_OP_GROUP, version)
148                .getResources().stream()
149                .filter(r -> VM_OP_KIND_VM.equals(r.getKind()))
150                .findFirst()
151                .ifPresent(crd -> watchVmDefs(crd, version));
152        }
153    }
154
155    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CognitiveComplexity")
156    private void purge(ApiClient client, CustomObjectsApi coa,
157            List<String> vmOpApiVersions) throws ApiException {
158        // Get existing CRs (VMs)
159        Set<String> known = new HashSet<>();
160        for (var version : vmOpApiVersions) {
161            // Get all known CR instances.
162            coa.getAPIResources(VM_OP_GROUP, version)
163                .getResources().stream()
164                .filter(r -> VM_OP_KIND_VM.equals(r.getKind()))
165                .findFirst()
166                .ifPresent(crd -> known.addAll(getKnown(client, crd, version)));
167        }
168
169        ListOptions opts = new ListOptions();
170        opts.setLabelSelector(
171            "app.kubernetes.io/managed-by=" + VM_OP_NAME + ","
172                + "app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME);
173        for (String resource : List.of("apps/v1/statefulsets",
174            "v1/configmaps", "v1/secrets")) {
175            @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops",
176                "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
177            var resParts = new LinkedList<>(List.of(resource.split("/")));
178            var group = resParts.size() == 3 ? resParts.poll() : "";
179            var version = resParts.poll();
180            var plural = resParts.poll();
181            // Get resources, selected by label
182            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
183            var api = new DynamicKubernetesApi(group, version, plural, client);
184            var listObj = api.list(namespaceToWatch, opts).getObject();
185            if (listObj == null) {
186                continue;
187            }
188            for (var obj : listObj.getItems()) {
189                String instance = obj.getMetadata().getLabels()
190                    .get("app.kubernetes.io/instance");
191                if (!known.contains(instance)) {
192                    var resName = obj.getMetadata().getName();
193                    var result = api.delete(namespaceToWatch, resName);
194                    if (!result.isSuccess()) {
195                        logger.warning(() -> "Cannot cleanup resource \""
196                            + resName + "\": " + result.toString());
197                    }
198                }
199            }
200        }
201    }
202
203    private Set<String> getKnown(ApiClient client, V1APIResource crd,
204            String version) {
205        Set<String> result = new HashSet<>();
206        var api = new DynamicKubernetesApi(VM_OP_GROUP, version,
207            crd.getName(), client);
208        for (var item : api.list(namespaceToWatch).getObject().getItems()) {
209            if (!VM_OP_KIND_VM.equals(item.getKind())) {
210                continue;
211            }
212            result.add(item.getMetadata().getName());
213        }
214        return result;
215    }
216
217    private void watchVmDefs(V1APIResource crd, String version) {
218        @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops",
219            "PMD.AvoidCatchingThrowable", "PMD.AvoidCatchingGenericException" })
220        var watcher = new Thread(() -> {
221            try {
222                logger.info(() -> "Watching objects created from "
223                    + crd.getName() + "." + VM_OP_GROUP + "/" + version);
224                // Watch sometimes terminates without apparent reason.
225                while (true) {
226                    Instant startedAt = Instant.now();
227                    var client = Config.defaultClient();
228                    var coa = new CustomObjectsApi(client);
229                    var call = coa.listNamespacedCustomObjectCall(VM_OP_GROUP,
230                        version, namespaceToWatch, crd.getName(), null, false,
231                        null, null, null, null, null, null, null, true, null);
232                    try (Watch<V1Namespace> watch
233                        = Watch.createWatch(client, call,
234                            new TypeToken<Watch.Response<V1Namespace>>() {
235                            }.getType())) {
236                        for (Watch.Response<V1Namespace> item : watch) {
237                            handleVmDefinitionChange(crd, item);
238                        }
239                    } catch (IOException | ApiException | RuntimeException e) {
240                        logger.log(Level.FINE, e, () -> "Problem watching \""
241                            + crd.getName() + "\" (will retry): "
242                            + e.getMessage());
243                        delayRestart(startedAt);
244                    }
245                }
246            } catch (Throwable e) {
247                logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e, () -> "Probem watching: "
248                    + e.getMessage());
249            }
250            fire(new Stop());
251        });
252        watcher.setDaemon(true);
253        watcher.start();
254    }
255
256    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition")
257    private void delayRestart(Instant started) {
258        var runningFor = Duration
259            .between(started, Instant.now()).toMillis();
260        if (runningFor < 5000) {
261            logger.log(Level.FINE, () -> "Waiting... ");
262            try {
263                Thread.sleep(5000 - runningFor);
264            } catch (InterruptedException e1) { // NOPMD
265                // Retry
266            }
267            logger.log(Level.FINE, () -> "Retrying");
268        }
269    }
270
271    private void handleVmDefinitionChange(V1APIResource vmsCrd,
272            Watch.Response<V1Namespace> vmDefStub) {
273        V1ObjectMeta metadata = vmDefStub.object.getMetadata();
274        VmChannel channel = channels.computeIfAbsent(metadata.getName(),
275            k -> {
276                try {
277                    return new VmChannel(channel(), newEventPipeline(),
278                        Config.defaultClient());
279                } catch (IOException e) {
280                    logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e, () -> "Failed to create client"
281                        + " for handling changes: " + e.getMessage());
282                    return null;
283                }
284            });
285        if (channel == null) {
286            return;
287        }
288
289        // Get full definition and associate with channel as backup
290        var apiVersion = K8s.version(vmDefStub.object.getApiVersion());
291        DynamicKubernetesApi vmCrApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi(VM_OP_GROUP,
292            apiVersion, vmsCrd.getName(), channel.client());
293        var curVmDef = K8s.get(vmCrApi, metadata);
294        curVmDef.ifPresent(def -> {
295            // Augment with "dynamic" data and associate with channel
296            addDynamicData(channel.client(), def);
297            channel.setVmDefinition(def);
298        });
299
300        // Get eventual definition to use
301        var vmDef = curVmDef.orElse(channel.vmDefinition());
302
303        // Create and fire event
304        channel.pipeline().fire(new VmDefChanged(VmDefChanged.Type
305            .valueOf(vmDefStub.type),
306            channel
307                .setGeneration(vmDefStub.object.getMetadata().getGeneration()),
308            vmsCrd, vmDef), channel);
309    }
310
311    private void addDynamicData(ApiClient client,
312            DynamicKubernetesObject vmDef) {
313        var rootNode = GsonPtr.to(vmDef.getRaw()).get(JsonObject.class);
314        rootNode.addProperty("nodeName", "");
315
316        // VM definition status changes before the pod terminates.
317        // This results in pod information being shown for a stopped
318        // VM which is irritating. So check condition first.
319        var isRunning = GsonPtr.to(rootNode).to("status", "conditions")
320            .get(JsonArray.class)
321            .asList().stream().filter(el -> "Running"
322                .equals(((JsonObject) el).get("type").getAsString()))
323            .findFirst().map(el -> "True"
324                .equals(((JsonObject) el).get("status").getAsString()))
325            .orElse(false);
326        if (!isRunning) {
327            return;
328        }
329        var podSearch = new ListOptions();
330        podSearch.setLabelSelector("app.kubernetes.io/name=" + APP_NAME
331            + ",app.kubernetes.io/component=" + APP_NAME
332            + ",app.kubernetes.io/instance=" + vmDef.getMetadata().getName());
333        var podList = K8s.podApi(client).list(namespaceToWatch, podSearch);
334        podList.getObject().getItems().stream().forEach(pod -> {
335            rootNode.addProperty("nodeName", pod.getSpec().getNodeName());
336        });
337    }
338
339    /**
340     * Remove VM channel when VM is deleted.
341     *
342     * @param event the event
343     * @param channel the channel
344     */
345    @Handler(priority = -10_000)
346    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel) {
347        if (event.type() == Type.DELETED) {
348            channels.remove(event.vmDefinition().getMetadata().getName());
349        }
350    }
